meanings.definition: The outer curved ridge of the ear.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her anthelices while admiring her earrings.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's anthelices during the ear check-up.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten loved to play with the anthelices of the toy bunny.
meanings.sent4: The wind whispered secrets to the trees, causing their anthelices to sway gently.
meanings.sent5: The anthelices of the seashell resembled delicate waves frozen in time.
